object_description: A rectangular puzzle block with green, orange, and black segments, resembling a Rubik's cube variation.

milestones.label: approach
milestones.description: The hand moves toward the puzzle block on the table.

milestones.label: grasp
milestones.description: The fingers and thumb make firm contact and grip the sides of the puzzle block.

milestones.label: lift
milestones.description: The hand raises the puzzle block off the wooden surface.

milestones.label: transport
milestones.description: The hand holds the puzzle block in mid-air, adjusting its position.

milestones.label: release
milestones.description: The hand sets the puzzle block down and releases its grip, moving away from the object.
